title: kai tozhavE eduvum
sahitya:
kai tozhavE eduvum kai kUDum tumbikkaiyanai meyyanaik-karimukha varadanai


anupallavi

  sei tozhil sirappura cintai teLivu pera vaittiDuvOnai vEzha mukhattOnai


caraNam    Ainkaranai ninaittu ArambhamAgum attanai kAriyamum anukUlamAgum
ayyamillai veTri nam vashamAgum Ayiram Ayiram nanmai yuNDAgum
